**simulizer** is a data simulation tool used to generate random data sets that maintain similar structure to an actual data set.


Table of Contents
============

-   [Installation](#installation)
-   [Contact](#contact)

Installation
============


To download the development version of **simulizer**:

Use the **devtools** package to install the development version:

    library("devtools")
    install_bitbucket("campuslabs/datascience-packages/simulizer", auth_user = "YOUR_BITBUCKET_USERNAME", password="YOUR_PASSWORD")
